name: THE MAGICIANS
author: Lev Grossman
desciption: Story of Quentin Coldwater, a young man who discovers and attends a secret college of magic in New York

name: THE THRONE OF FIRE
author: Rick Riordan
desciption: The gods of Ancient Egypt were unleashed in the modern world

name: TOM JONES
author: Henry Fielding
desciption: novel that captures the spirit of its age and whose famous characters have come to represent Augustan society in all its loquacious, turbulent, comic variety

name: THE PILIGRIM'S PROGRESS
author: John Bunyan
desciption: A story of a man in search of truth told with the simple clarity and beauty of Bunyan’s prose make this the ultimate English classic.

name: NIGHTMARE ABBEY
author: Thomas Love Peacock
desciption: The great pleasure of Nightmare Abbey, which was inspired by Thomas Love Peacock’s friendship with Shelley, lies in the delight the author takes in poking fun at the romantic movement
